channel.title: CVE Feed for Toyoko Inn IT Solution Co., Ltd. -- Toyoko Inn official App for iOS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Toyoko Inn IT Solution Co., Ltd. -- Toyoko Inn official App for iOS

item.title: CVE-2024-27440|2024-08-02T00:34:52.381Z -- toyoko%20inn%20it%20solution%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- toyoko%20inn%20official%20app%20for%20ios
item.description: The Toyoko Inn official App for iOS versions prior to 1.13.0 and Toyoko Inn official App for Android versions prior 1.3.14 don't properly verify server certificates, which allows a man-in-the-middle attacker to spoof servers and obtain sensitive information via a crafted certificate.

item.title: CVE-2024-27440|2024-03-13T05:40:22.838Z -- toyoko%20inn%20it%20solution%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- toyoko%20inn%20official%20app%20for%20ios
item.description: The Toyoko Inn official App for iOS versions prior to 1.13.0 and Toyoko Inn official App for Android versions prior 1.3.14 don't properly verify server certificates, which allows a man-in-the-middle attacker to spoof servers and obtain sensitive information via a crafted certificate.
